channel.title: Chapter 4: Hatred on From Draenor With Love
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 4: Hatred on From Draenor With Love

item.title: Guest of Honour
item.description: That wraps up Chapter Four! What does Sablemane want with Wrathion? What‚Äôs going to happen to Rades? What happened to Four? At least Vid‚Äôs received some happy news‚Ä¶ Speaking of Wrathion, I sure am curious what we‚Äôll see of him in Warlords. I believe his only appearance so far takes place ‚Äúoff-camera‚Äù, mentioned in Admiral Taylor‚Äôs Garrison Log, which doesn‚Äôt really tell us much. Clearly the Black Prince has SOMETHING in mind, SOME objective here on AU-Draenor.

item.title: DoT
item.description: Rades, you should know better than to travel with such an injury! But then again I suppose your options were rather limited. (Technically in-game Rades has maxed out First Aid, but let‚Äôs just assume that this type of wound is beyond the scope of a few bandages.) Many thanks to our latest Daily Quests, one of our favorite WoW comics, and tremor3258! üòÄ

item.title: What Goes Up
item.description: Poor Four. Brawler‚Äôs Guild just couldn‚Äôt really prepare her for what to do when hitchhiking on the back of an unwilling flying black dragon, I guess. Now, if only she were an engineer, she‚Äôd be fine here! A parachute cloak, or a goblin glider, and she‚Äôd be laughing. Sadly, Four is not an engineer. In other business, thank you to Jasyla for being our latest Patreon supporter! <3

item.title: The Light Reveals, Part Two
item.description: The funny thing about creating a weekly comic strip is that sometimes events take a little while to unfold. Though we‚Äôve had this particular moment Patreon supporters will forgive me for not showing the sketch for this page a day early as usual ‚Äì I didn‚Äôt want to spoil the final version! If you want to be further emotionally devastated today, Unbroken is necessary reading. We used much of the physical description of the process of becoming Broken from this short story to help determine what our important character should look like.

item.title: The Light Reveals, Part One
item.description: I wonder if we‚Äôll see any Broken this expansion. I know history has changed, and the orcs didn‚Äôt drink the blood of Mannoroth‚Ä¶but Gul‚Äôdan IS out there, green-skinned and demon-tainted. So there‚Äôs definitely fel magic on the table, albeit on a smaller scale ‚Äì for now, at least. And judging from the questlines, you KNOW Gul‚Äôdan has some pretty significant plans of his own meant to further his own schemes, and probably those of the Legion, who clearly still have their eyes on Draenor‚Ä¶

item.title: Be our guest
item.description: What an expensive bit of therapy. The engineer in me is crying. Hope everyone is enjoying Warlords so far! I know both Vid and I are LOVING all the new lore, familiar faces, and overall storyline. And GARRISONS! Oh my god, the garrisons. What more needs to be said. Now if you‚Äôll excuse me, I think it‚Äôs almost time to send my followers out on today‚Äôs missions.

item.title: The one that got away
item.description: Funny story about panel 5 on this page ‚Äì without meaning to, I had unconsciously modeled Four‚Äôs pose after Spider-Man comic I read twenty-four years ago. And then, after realizing this fact, I was able to identify, track down and download said comic to examine the angle of the pose. God bless the internet. IT‚ÄôS WARLORDS LAUNCH TOMORROW! If you‚Äôre taking the day off to enjoy it, make sure you have some snacks and drinks to keep you going!

item.title: More than you can chew
item.description: It‚Äôs like that Feist song. It‚Äôs Blizzcon time! Last time Vid and I were stunned with the announcement that WoW was returning to Draenor ‚Äì one might say ‚Äúwith love‚Äù ‚Äì so it‚Äôll be interesting to see what the big news and surprises are this time! It‚Äôs funny ‚Äì when the news about Warlords of Draenor hit, we were actually a little alarmed, wondering if it was going to affect FDWL‚Äôs storyline.

item.title: Eyes on the Prize
item.description: Okay, this isn‚Äôt exactly how Flare works in-game, but Rades IS an engineer, after all. This week‚Äôs patch notes were pretty funny, especially ‚ÄúThrall received a reminder that he is currently still on Azeroth.‚Äù Of course, instead of talking like he was already on Draenor, Thrall now talks like he‚Äôs back in Orgrimmar as Horde Warchief. Oh, Thrall. Vid got a Grand Expedition Yak this week, which means Transmog ANYWHERE, ANYTIME.

item.title: Righteous Defense
item.description: Somewhere, Protection Paladins are crying in remembrance.

item.title: The Nose Knows
item.description: When Vid & Rades were making their travel plans way back at the start of Chapter 2, there were some comments wondering about Sablemane and Wrathion. These queries continued when Sablemane actually showed up on page 25. Well, trust us, these two meeting and interacting has ALWAYS been one of the stories we‚Äôve wanted to tell in FDWL. They‚Äôre such interesting personalities, with such great potential! In other news, thanks to some very generous Patreon patrons, we‚Äôre looking to get our website looked at sometime soon!

item.title: Chapter Four: Hatred
item.description: And we‚Äôre back! What‚Äôs Sabellian here for? How is Rades doing? Why did the Broken stop? These answers and more, coming to a From Draenor near you! We also have some other, exciting news ‚Äì we‚Äôve started a Patreon account! Now don‚Äôt worry ‚Äì From Draenor With Love will always remain free for your reading enjoyment. However, working on the comic does take us a lot of time each week, and we do have operating costs such as web hosting, brushes, inks, etc.
